Package ohos.security.permission

Provides permission-related interfaces and information, such as permission group information.
Since:
3
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Permission.OnRequestPermissionsResult
    Provides callbacks for Permission#requestPermissionsFromRemote.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Permission
    Provides methods for permission management, such as granting, revoking, and requesting permissions.
    PermissionDef
    Provides known system security permissions.
    PermissionFlags
    Defines the set of markup states for permissions.
    PermissionGroupDef
    Provides known system security permission groups.
    PermissionState
    Defines a collection used to represent the grant status of permissions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PermissionAvailableScope
    Defines the application scope of the permission.
    PermissionGrantMode
    Defines the permission authorization mode.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    NeedsPermission
    Indicates that one or more permissions are required for invoking an interface.
    PermissionLevel
    Indicates the protection level of a permission.
